oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Giants of Black Capitalism
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lee, George W.; Herndon, N. B.; Universal Life Insurance Company; Walker, A. Maceo; Whalum, Harold; insurance; business;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Article discussing the success of black insurance companies. Includes pictures of many company presidents. Handwritten note on first page reads: "Must change name back to Negro Ins. Association [illegible]".
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Manuscript collection processed by Mary B. Clark
